p: Our phylogeographic reconstruction for this data set demonstrated that the origin of CRF55_01B was located among MSM in Guangdong between April 2000 and April 2005 (Fig. 4; Supplementary Fig. S4). However, we found that Guangdong was the most important hub of dissemination of CRF55_01B outbreak, fueling the origin of new local epidemics in Shanghai and other provinces (Fig. 5). We also identified one bidirectional transition event between Shanghai and Guangdong. These results indicate the complex spatial dynamics of CRF55_01B.
